mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscription (user_id, product_id, subscription_status, start_date, end_date, cancel_reason, cancel_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{subscriptionStatus}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{cancelReason}, #{cancelDate})
mapper.select: SELECT s.subscription_id, s.user_id, s.product_id, s.subscription_status, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.cancel_reason, s.cancel_date, p.product_name, p.image, p.price, p.category_name FROM subscription s JOIN product p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY s.subscription_id DESC
